General.Name: Auna S.A.
General.Description: Auna S.A., a healthcare service provider, operates hospitals and clinics in Mexico, Peru, and Colombia. It provides prepaid healthcare plans in Peru; and dental and vision plans in Mexico. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Luxembourg, Luxembourg.
